# Review of Bosch Home & Kitchen Appliances SMS2ITI41G Dishwasher

## Introduction
Brief overview of the Bosch Home & Kitchen Appliances SMS2ITI41G Dishwasher and its key features.

## Design & Build Quality
Description of the design elements and build quality of the dishwasher, including its freestanding design and silver finish.

## Performance
Evaluation of the performance of the dishwasher, focusing on its SpeedPerfect+ feature, Extra Dry function, and ability to handle 12 place settings.

## Connectivity & App Integration
Discussion of the dishwasher's WiFi connectivity and integration with the Home Connect app, highlighting the convenience and control it offers users.

## Pros & Cons
List of the pros and cons of the Bosch Home & Kitchen Appliances SMS2ITI41G Dishwasher based on the review.

## Conclusion
Final thoughts on the Bosch Home & Kitchen Appliances SMS2ITI41G Dishwasher and whether it is worth considering for your home.
